mapper.insert: insert into cs_order_asset (orderId, assetId, serviceId, scan_type, scan_date) values(#{orderId}, #{assetId}, #{serviceId}, #{scan_type}, #{scan_date})
insert into cs_order_ip (orderId, ip, bandwidth, serviceId) values(#{orderId}, #{ip}, #{bandwidth}, #{serviceId})
mapper.select: select a.name,a.addr from cs_order_asset oa,cs_asset a where oa.orderId=#{orderId} and oa.assetid = a.id

select o.id,o.type,o.websoc,o.create_date,s.name,o.status from cs_order o,cs_order_asset oa,cs_service s where o.id = oa.orderId and o.serviceId = s.id and oa.assetId = #{assetId} and o.status != 0 order by o.create_date desc
select oa.assetName as name,oa.assetAddr as addr,oa.id as orderAssetId, oa.ipArray from cs_order_asset oa where oa.orderId=#{orderId}
